title: Confucianism and the Taiwan experience
creator_credit: Wu Li-Ching and Kwang Hwa Mass Communications
brief_description: Confucianism focuses on diligence, thrift, harmony and love of learning. This documentary looks at how the people of Taiwan have taken these values to heart in the economic rebuilding of their country. Modern Taiwan is drawing on the spirit of Confucianism for inspiration as the republic progresses towards the 21st Ccentury.
